item.title: Jesse's guide to Belgium ðŸ‡§ðŸ‡ª
item.author: Jesse Geens
item.description: Jesse’s guide to Belgium 🇧🇪 Many of my friends regularly come to Belgium and ask me what they can see and eat here. Instead of always copy-pasting the same answer, I decided to write a small blogpost about it! I will highlight some famous Belgian dishes that you must try while you’re here, as well as highlighting some things you can do in Belgium’s largest and pretties cities. NOTE: this post is still a work in progress.
